mapper.insert: insert into GBOARD values ( gbbs_num_seq.nextval, #{gbbs_mem_no}, #{gbbs_subject}, #{gbbs_content}, #{gbbs_file, jdbcType=VARCHAR},0, sysdate, 0, ',', 0 )
mapper.select: select rownum, grnum, gbbs_userid, gbbs_author, gbbs_num,gbbs_mem_no,gbbs_subject,gbbs_content,gbbs_readcount,gbbs_date,gbbs_like,gbbs_likeno,gbbs_file,gbbs_comm from (select rownum grnum, m.mem_id gbbs_userid, m.mem_nm gbbs_author, g.g_no gbbs_num, g.mem_no gbbs_mem_no, g.g_sj gbbs_subject, g.g_ct gbbs_content, g.g_rc gbbs_readcount, g.g_dt gbbs_date, g.g_lk gbbs_like, g.g_lkno gbbs_likeno, g.g_fl gbbs_file, g.GCOMM_CNT gbbs_comm from member m, glist g where g.mem_no=m.mem_no order by g.g_no desc ) where grnum >= ((#{page}-1) * #{limit} +1) and grnum <= (#{page} * #{limit}) order by grnum asc

select count(*) from (select rownum , m.mem_no mmem_no, m.mem_nm mmem_nm, g.g_no gg_no, g.mem_no gmem_no, g.g_sj gg_sj, g.g_ct gg_ct, g.g_fl gg_fl, g.g_rc gg_rc, g.g_dt gg_dt, g.g_lk gg_lk, g.g_lkno gg_lkno, g.gcomm_cnt ggcomm_cnt from member m, gboard g
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and m.mem_nm like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%' order by g.g_dt desc
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and g.g_sj like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%' order by g.g_dt desc
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and g.g_ct like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%' order by g.g_dt desc
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and ( g.g_ct like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%' or g.g_sj like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'% or g.g_ct like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%' ) order by g.g_dt desc
)

select rownum, grnum, gbbs_userid, gbbs_author,gbbs_num,gbbs_mem_no,gbbs_subject,gbbs_content,gbbs_readcount,gbbs_date,gbbs_like,gbbs_likeno,gbbs_file,gbbs_comm from (select rownum grnum, m.mem_id gbbs_userid, m.mem_nm gbbs_author, g.g_no gbbs_num, g.mem_no gbbs_mem_no, g.g_sj gbbs_subject, g.g_ct gbbs_content, g.g_rc gbbs_readcount, g.g_dt gbbs_date, g.g_lk gbbs_like, g.g_lkno gbbs_likeno, g.g_fl gbbs_file, g.GCOMM_CNT gbbs_comm from member m, glist g
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and m.mem_nm like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%'
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and g.g_sj like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%'
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and g.g_ct like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%'
where g.mem_no=m.mem_no and ( g.g_ct like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%' or g.g_sj like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'% or g.g_ct like '%'||#{gfind_name}||'%' ) order by g.g_dt desc
order by rownum desc
) where grnum >= ((#{page}-1) * #{limit} +1) and grnum <= (#{page} * #{limit}) order by grnum asc
mapper.update: update GBOARD set G_RC = G_RC - 1 , G_LK = G_LK + 1 , G_LKNO = concat(concat(G_LKNO, #{usernum}),',') where G_NO = #{gbbs_num} and G_LKNO NOT LIKE '%,'||#{usernum}||',%'
